properties.name: AzureAppID
properties.caption: Azure App ID
properties.description: The application ID of the Azure App used to secure the Azure Function app

properties.name: AzureFunction
properties.caption: Azure Function app url
properties.description: Your Azure Page Transformation Function app url (e.g. https://contosomodernization.azurewebsites.net)

properties.name: CenterUrl
properties.caption: Modernization center URL
properties.description: URL for the modernization center site (should be /sites/modernizationcenter)

properties.name: ModernizationFeedbackList
properties.caption: Modernization Feedback List name
properties.description: Name for the modernization feedback list (should be ModernizationFeedbackList)
